publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for H. Brome ... and H. Marsh ...,

notesStmt.note: Fourth part of Walker's The history of independency, added by T.M.; published with preceding three parts in one volume in 1661. Cf. DNB, v. 20, p. 505.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
